00142     bool Vector3::operator== (const Vector3 &Vec2)
00143     {
00144         if ( Vec2.X == this->X && Vec2.Y == this->Y && Vec2.Z == this->Z )
00145             { return true; }
00146         return false;
00147     }

00280     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00281     // Fancy Math
00282 
00283     Vector3 Vector3::CrossProduct( const Vector3& rkVector ) const
00284     {
00285         return Vector3(
00286                 this->Y * rkVector.Z - this->Z * rkVector.Y,
00287                 this->Z * rkVector.X - this->X * rkVector.Z,
00288                 this->X * rkVector.Y - this->Y * rkVector.X
00289             );
00290     }
00291 
00292     Real Vector3::dotProduct(const Vector3& vec) const
00293     {
00294         return this->X * vec.X + this->Y * vec.Y + this->Z * vec.Z;
00295     }
00296 
00297     void Vector3::Normalize()
00298     {
00299         Real TempLength = this->Distance(Vector3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f));
00300         if (0!=TempLength)
00301         {
00302              (*this) /= TempLength;
00303         }else{
00304             /// @todo discuss the merits throwing an error here.
00305         }
00306     }
00307 
00308     Vector3 Vector3::GetNormal() const
00309     {
00310         Real TempLength = this->Distance(Vector3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f));
00311         if (0!=TempLength)
00312         {
00313             return (*this) / TempLength;
00314         }else{
00315             /// @todo discuss the merits throwing an error here.
00316             return (*this);
00317         }
00318     }
00319 
00320     void Vector3::Inverse()
00321     {
00322         X=1/X;
00323         Y=1/Y;
00324         Z=1/Z;
00325     }

00327     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00328     // Manual Conversions
00329     btVector3 Vector3::GetBulletVector3() const
00330     {
00331         btVector3 Theirs;
00332         Theirs.setX(this->X);
00333         Theirs.setY(this->Y);
00334         Theirs.setZ(this->Z);
00335         Theirs.setW(0);
00336         return Theirs;
00337     }

00339     void Vector3::ExtractBulletVector3(btVector3 Ours)
00340     {
00341         this->X=Ours.getX();
00342         this->Y=Ours.getY();
00343         this->Z=Ours.getZ();
00344     }

00371     void Vector3::ExtractcAudioVector3(cAudio::cVector3 Ours)

00375         this->Z=Ours.z;
00376     }
00377 
00378     Real Vector3::Distance(const Vector3 &OtherVec) const
00379     {
00380         float Xdelta = Ogre::Math::Abs(this->X - OtherVec.X);
00381         float Ydelta = Ogre::Math::Abs(this->Y - OtherVec.Y);
00382         float Zdelta = Ogre::Math::Abs(this->Z - OtherVec.Z);
00383         return Ogre::Math::Sqrt( Xdelta*Xdelta + Ydelta*Ydelta + Zdelta*Zdelta );
00384     }
00385

00390 std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const phys::Vector3& x)
00391 {
00392     stream << "[" << x.X << "," << x.Y << "," << x.Z << "]";
00393     return stream;
00394 }
